name: A Favor for My Hooman
description:
This is a game made for CS/Art 108 class!

It's Mr. Albert birthday, but his daughter not gonna show up. But it will be ok, because Jasper the Cat is here to do a favor for his hooman!

## Keyboard Controls

Up - Up Arrow / W  

Down - Down Arrow / S  

Left - Left Arrow / A  

Right - Right Arrow / D  

Interaction - Z

##Dev note##

One of the puzzles is broken due to the version of GBStudio no longer support its function. The new update will come soon!
